strings:
Swiss-Army-Knife Addon http://code.google.com/p/swiss-army-knife
Script Devices Default dvd-device Default bluray-device Used directorys Default iso-rip-directory Default dvd-transcode-h264 directory Default bluray mkv-directory Various settings Default ssh-command Default 1. audio language (dvd) Default 2. audio language (dvd) Default transcoding (dvd) Enable bluray-functions Enable network ripping functions Enable transcode & burning functions Password protect Expert-Mode Password Default size single-layer dvd Default netcat start-port (6 udp ports) Verbose debug Default subtitle (dvd) Enable customer-shell-scripts Default vobcopy directory Default master network directory Default timeout 1: state-file Default timeout 2: chapter-dvd Default timeout 3: chapter-bluray Default burning-transcode directory Default iphone-transcode directory Default psp-transcode directory
Mainmenu Swiss-Army-Knife Job-Window Mainmenu Expert-Mode Mainmenu Network Mainmenu User-Functions Mainmenu Transcode & Burning
Transcode BluRay to MKV Transcode DVD Expert-Mode Job-Controll Exit
Transcode BluRay to MKV (confirmend) Transcode DVD high-profile(confirmed) Ripp DVD to ISO (confirmed) Rescue-copy DVD to iso (confirmed) Copy vob-files from DVD to hd (confirmed) Transcode & Burning Network-Functions User-Scripts Test ssh connection Info Back
Start Master Start Slave [dvd to master] Start Slave [bluray to master] Reserved Back IP-Adress of the Master
transcode bluray to mkv copy subtitle transcoding pass 1 transcoding pass 2 copy dvd to iso-file resque-copy dvd to iso-file copy all vobs to harddisk copy from slave copy to master transcode dvd to mkv transcoding pass 1/1 for mp4
Progress-bar Kill job Remove lock-file Back Stage :
There are no active jobs
DVD -> ISO for burning DVD -> MKV DVD -> h264 low-profile DVD -> Iphone DVD -> PSP Back
Back
info-box Please select Bluray-track to export Bluray transcoding startet successfull Bluray transcoding could not be started This feature comes in a later release Job canceld by user Please select DVD-track to export DVD transcoding startet successfull DVD transcoding could not be started DVD iso copy startet successfull DVD iso copy could not be started Please enter password for Expert-Mode The password was not correct INFO: WARNING: ERROR:
ssh-test connection was successfull ssh-test connection failed Please select directory to save Direcory-name contains spaces Selected direcory is not writeable Export-name without extension Export-name contains not valid chars You must confirm a name Please select primary audio-language Would you like to add a secound audio-language ? Would you like to use subtitles ? Please select secoundary audio-language Please select subtitle-track to use DVD vobcopy startet successfull DVD vobcopy could not be started Active Job finished successfull Please insert empty single-layer-dvd Please insert empty dual-layer-dvd This menu is only visible if there are any user-functions
Prior to run this addon setup.sh must be executed Inserted disc is not a Bluray-Disc Timeout t1 to short : media/state could not be openend Bluray-functions are disabled. Timeout t3 to short : blueray-chapters ISO-directory not found or writeable ! DVD-directory not found or writeable ! Bluray-directory not found or writeable ! Device is locked by a active job ! Device is not ready ! Job could no be killed Inserted disc is not a DVD-Disc Timeout t2 to short : chapters dvd Problem with generated audio-tracklist Problem with generated subtitle-tracklist Licence-key for makemkv expired Configured ssh-user is not current user The inserted dvd is not mounted Vobcopy-directory not found or writeable ! Network master directory not found or writeable ! Network-functions are disabled. Local ssh server is not configured properly User-functions are disabled Error inside the active job -- Burning and Transcode functions are disabled Burning and Transcode directory not found or writeable ! Run setup.sh to create ssh-dir ! This trancoding features needs makemkv ! No connection to network-master possible ! No connection fromm a client was made ! IPHONE-directory not found or writeable ! PSP-directory not found or writeable ! Default mkv needs bluray-functions Copy-Protection detected. Process anyway ?
